item.name: Akroma's Blessing

(Those creatures can't attack.) When Aurification leaves the battlefield, remove all gold counters from all creatures.

item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: Aphetto's swamps are alive with the dead.

item.name: Aphetto Dredging
item.text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.

item.name: Aphetto Vulture
item.text: Flying When Aphetto Vulture is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

item.name: Blackmail
item.text: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: Even the most virtuous person is only one secret away from being owned by the Cabal.

item.name: Boneknitter
item.text: {1}{B}: Regenerate target Zombie. Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Nothing comes together as easily as it comes apart.

item.name: Cabal Archon
item.text: {B}, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "You are weak. I am strong. The protocol is obvious."

item.name: Cabal Executioner
item.text: Whenever Cabal Executioner deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Cabal Slaver
item.text: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
item.flavorText: "In its natural habitat, the goblin is stupid, yet devious. Now it's stupid, devious, and powerful."

item.name: Chain of Smog
item.text: Target player discards two cards. That player may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

item.name: Cover of Darkness
item.text: As Cover of Darkness enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

item.name: Crown of Suspicion
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1. Sacrifice Crown of Suspicion: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Darkness, hide my fear."

item.name: Cruel Revival
item.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

item.name: Death Match
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have target creature of his or her choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The Cabal breeds many things for the pit fights, but it never breeds compassion.

item.name: Death Pulse
item.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Cycling {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Death Pulse, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.name: Dirge of Dread
item.text: All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Dirge of Dread, you may have target creature gain fear until end of turn.

item.name: Disciple of Malice
item.text: Protection from white Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: The lantern he carried did not light his way—it signaled his approach.

item.name: Doomed Necromancer
item.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "His sacrifice shall not be forgotten. Now toss his body over there with the others." —Phage the Untouchable

item.name: Ebonblade Reaper
item.text: Whenever Ebonblade Reaper attacks, you lose half your life, rounded up. Whenever Ebonblade Reaper deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up. Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Endemic Plague
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Endemic Plague, sacrifice a creature. Destroy all creatures that share a creature type with the sacrificed creature. They can't be regenerated.

item.name: Entrails Feaster
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Entrails Feaster. If you don't, tap Entrails Feaster.

item.name: Fade from Memory
item.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Proper burial is a luxury Otarians can no longer afford.

item.name: Fallen Cleric
item.text: Protection from Clerics Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: The most terrifying zombies are those with just a hint of their old selves left.

item.name: False Cure
item.text: Until end of turn, whenever a player gains life, that player loses 2 life for each 1 life he or she gained.
item.flavorText: "I do unto others as others have done unto me." —Phage the Untouchable

item.name: Feeding Frenzy
item.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: It wasn't as much a strategy as a dim instinct to drown their prey.

item.name: Festering Goblin
item.text: When Festering Goblin is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

item.name: Frightshroud Courier
item.text: You may choose not to untap Frightshroud Courier during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Target Zombie creature gets +2/+2 and has fear for as long as Frightshroud Courier remains tapped. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

item.name: Gangrenous Goliath
item.text: Tap three untapped Clerics you control: Return Gangrenous Goliath from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Cabal clerics don't heal the sick—they heal the dead.

item.name: Gluttonous Zombie
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.

item.name: Gravespawn Sovereign
item.text: Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
item.flavorText: The Cabal never expected its creations to create servants of their own.

item.name: Grinning Demon
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life. Morph {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: It's drawn to the scent of screaming.

item.name: Haunted Cadaver
item.text: Whenever Haunted Cadaver deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, that player discards three cards. Morph {1}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Head Games
item.text: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. The player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Headhunter
item.text: Whenever Headhunter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Morph {B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Infest
item.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It is from Phage that this evil springs, and to her it shall return." —Akroma, angelic avenger

item.name: Misery Charm
item.text: Choose one — Destroy target Cleric; or return target Cleric card from your graveyard to your hand; or target player loses 2 life.

item.name: Nantuko Husk
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Nantuko Husk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace. —Nantuko teaching

item.name: Oversold Cemetery
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Patriarch's Bidding
item.text: Each player chooses a creature type. Each player returns all creature cards of a type chosen this way from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Family plots are so convenient." —Cabal Patriarch

item.name: Profane Prayers
item.text: Profane Prayers deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "We have ways to make you talk, but you have nothing interesting to say."

item.name: Prowling Pangolin
item.text: When Prowling Pangolin enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice Prowling Pangolin.
item.flavorText: It's always hungry, yet easily sated.

item.name: Rotlung Reanimator
item.text: Whenever Rotlung Reanimator or another Cleric is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Screeching Buzzard
item.text: Flying When Screeching Buzzard is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

item.name: Severed Legion
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

item.name: Shade's Breath
item.text: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes black, its creature type becomes Shade, and it gains "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
item.flavorText: The grim business of the Coliseum casts long shadows.

item.name: Shepherd of Rot
item.text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it." —Cabal Patriarch

item.name: Silent Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Silent Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards. Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Smother
item.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg." —Phage the Untouchable

item.name: Soulless One
item.text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
item.flavorText: "Surrender your soul to me."

item.name: Spined Basher
item.text: Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: "How cute. Does it do any other tricks?" —Braids, dementia summoner

item.name: Strongarm Tactics
item.text: Each player discards a card. Then each player who didn't discard a creature card this way loses 4 life.
item.flavorText: "If you can't pay your gambling debts, you just might be tomorrow's main attraction at the Grand Coliseum."

item.name: Swat
item.text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Few who cross Phage have the chance to repeat the mistake.

item.name: Syphon Mind
item.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
item.flavorText: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

item.name: Syphon Soul
item.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
item.flavorText: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

item.name: Thrashing Mudspawn
item.text: Whenever Thrashing Mudspawn is dealt damage, you lose that much life. Morph {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: It just obeys you. It doesn't like you.

item.name: Undead Gladiator
item.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Visara the Dreadful
item.text: Flying {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

item.name: Walking Desecration
item.text: {B}, {T}: Creatures of the creature type of your choice attack this turn if able.
item.flavorText: Such sacrilege turns blinding grief into blinding rage.

item.name: Withering Hex
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever a player cycles a card, put a plague counter on Withering Hex. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Withering Hex.

item.name: Words of Waste
item.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each opponent discards a card instead.
item.flavorText: "Terror corrupts order and paralyzes instinct." —Volume III, The Book of Decay

item.name: Wretched Anurid
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
item.flavorText: The only prince inside this frog is the one it ate.

item.name: Æther Charge
item.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it deal 4 damage to target opponent.
item.flavorText: "Is it just me, or does that meteor have teeth?"

item.name: Aggravated Assault
item.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.name: Airdrop Condor
item.text: Flying {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin creature: Airdrop Condor deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: It has two kinds of droppings, neither of which is particularly pleasant.

item.name: Avarax
item.text: Haste When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Battering Craghorn
item.text: First strike Morph {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

item.name: Blistering Firecat
item.text: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Blistering Firecat. Morph {R}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Break Open
item.text: Turn target face-down creature an opponent controls face up.
item.flavorText: There are two ways to resolve puzzling situations: thoughtful contemplation or force. After thoughtful contemplation, most barbarians choose force.

item.name: Brightstone Ritual
item.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Goblin on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Wizards fought over the stone to exploit its power. Goblins fight over it because it's shiny.

item.name: Butcher Orgg
item.text: You may assign Butcher Orgg's combat damage divided as you choose among defending player and/or any number of creatures he or she controls.
item.flavorText: It can kill you with three arms tied behind its back.

item.name: Chain of Plasma
item.text: Chain of Plasma deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may discard a card. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

item.name: Charging Slateback
item.text: Charging Slateback can't block. Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Goblins prize its hide for building rock sled runners.

item.name: Commando Raid
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls."

item.name: Crown of Fury
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike. Sacrifice Crown of Fury: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Passion, fire my heart."

item.name: Custody Battle
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent gains control of this creature unless you sacrifice a land."
item.flavorText: Goblins resolve disputes by splitting everything straight down the middle.

item.name: Dragon Roost
item.text: {5}{R}{R}: Put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: A powerful mage created the roost to guard a portal between the planes. The mage is long gone, but dragons still keep watch at the gate.

item.name: Dwarven Blastminer
item.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land. Morph {R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: "Life is too short for something like a hunk of rock to get in my way."

item.name: Embermage Goblin
item.text: When Embermage Goblin enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Embermage Goblin, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. {T}: Embermage Goblin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Erratic Explosion
item.text: Choose target creature or player. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Erratic Explosion deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Fever Charm
item.text: Choose one — Target creature gains haste until end of turn; or target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn; or Fever Charm deals 3 damage to target Wizard creature.

item.name: Flamestick Courier
item.text: You may choose not to untap Flamestick Courier during your untap step. {2}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+2 and has haste for as long as Flamestick Courier remains tapped.

item.name: Goblin Machinist
item.text: {2}{R}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Goblin Machinist gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Goblin Piledriver
item.text: Protection from blue Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.
item.flavorText: Throw enough goblins at any problem and it should go away. At the very least, there'll be fewer goblins.

item.name: Goblin Pyromancer
item.text: When Goblin Pyromancer enters the battlefield, Goblin creatures get +3/+0 until end of turn. At the beginning of the end step, destroy all Goblins.
item.flavorText: "The good news is, we figured out how the wand works. The bad news is, we figured out how the wand works."

item.name: Goblin Sharpshooter
item.text: Goblin Sharpshooter doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, untap Goblin Sharpshooter. {T}: Goblin Sharpshooter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Goblin Sky Raider
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: The goblin word for "flying" is more accurately translated as "falling slowly."

item.name: Goblin Sledder
item.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let's play ‘sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

item.name: Goblin Taskmaster
item.text: {1}{R}: Target Goblin creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: For some reason, goblin fighting school isn't as crowded on day two.

item.name: Grand Melee
item.text:
All creatures attack each turn if able.
All creatures block each turn if able.
item.flavorText: Hot blood washes away cold reason.

item.name: Gratuitous Violence
item.text: If a creature you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
item.flavorText: Only the Cabal could make a fight to the death more deadly.

item.name: Insurrection
item.text: Untap all creatures and gain control of them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Maybe they wanted to be on the winning side for once." —Matoc, lavamancer

item.name: Kaboom!
item.text: Choose any number of target players. For each of those players, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Kaboom deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that player, then you put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Lavamancer's Skill
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature." If enchanted creature is a Wizard, it has "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature."

item.name: Lay Waste
item.text: Destroy target land. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Skirk Ridge had survived earthquakes, mudslides, and meteor showers. Then the goblins moved in.

item.name: Lightning Rift
item.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, Lightning Rift deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Options will cost you, but a lack of them will cost you even more.

item.name: Mana Echoes
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may add {X} to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures you control that share a creature type with it.
item.flavorText: When the ground is saturated with mana, even the lightest footstep can bring it to the surface.

item.name: Menacing Ogre
item.text: Trample, haste When Menacing Ogre enters the battlefield, each player secretly chooses a number. Then those numbers are revealed. Each player with the highest number loses that much life. If you are one of those players, put two +1/+1 counters on Menacing Ogre.

item.name: Nosy Goblin
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Nosy Goblin: Destroy target face-down creature.
item.flavorText: To his surprise, Furt discovered that the strange creatures were not at all like bugs.

item.name: Pinpoint Avalanche
item.text: Pinpoint Avalanche deals 4 damage to target creature. The damage can't be prevented.
item.flavorText: "Some solve problems by thinking and talking. Others use rocks." —Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

item.name: Reckless One
item.text: Haste Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Release chaos with me"

item.name: Risky Move
item.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains control of Risky Move.
When you gain control of Risky Move from another player, choose a creature you control and an opponent. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, that opponent gains control of that creature.

item.name: Rorix Bladewing
item.text: Flying, haste
item.flavorText: In the smoldering ashes of Shiv, a few dragons strive to rebuild their native land. The rest seek any opportunity to restore the broken pride of their race.

item.name: Searing Flesh
item.text: Searing Flesh deals 7 damage to target opponent.
item.flavorText: Zemoo found out the hard way that "inflammable" and "flammable" mean the same thing.

item.name: Shaleskin Bruiser
item.text: Trample Whenever Shaleskin Bruiser attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Beast.
item.flavorText: Its only predators are the elements.

item.name: Shock
item.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "I love lightning It's my best invention since the rock." —Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

item.name: Skirk Commando
item.text: Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls. Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Skirk Fire Marshal
item.text: Protection from red Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

item.name: Skirk Prospector
item.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die." —Braids, dementia summoner

item.name: Skittish Valesk
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, turn Skittish Valesk face down. Morph {5}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Slice and Dice
item.text: Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature. Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

item.name: Snapping Thragg
item.text: Whenever Snapping Thragg deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 3 damage to target creature that player controls. Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Solar Blast
item.text: Solar Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Cycling {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Solar Blast, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Sparksmith
item.text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

item.name: Spitfire Handler
item.text: Spitfire Handler can't block creatures with power greater than Spitfire Handler's power. {R}: Spitfire Handler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Wait 'til Toggo sees this"

item.name: Spurred Wolverine
item.text: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: After a few painful experiences, goblins learned not to pick their noses around the beasts.

item.name: Starstorm
item.text: Starstorm deals X damage to each creature. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Pardic barbarians didn't complain when the Order started blaming every crisis on the Cabal.

item.name: Tephraderm
item.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that creature.
Whenever a spell deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that spell's controller.

item.name: Thoughtbound Primoc
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more Wizards than each other player, that player gains control of Thoughtbound Primoc.
item.flavorText: Efforts to use them as spies failed when they kept reporting to the enemy.

item.name: Threaten
item.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
item.flavorText: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

item.name: Thunder of Hooves
item.text: Thunder of Hooves deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player, where X is the number of Beasts on the battlefield.

item.name: Wave of Indifference
item.text: X target creatures can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: "Darius?" "Yeah?" "There's a goblin sneaking up on you." "So?" "Just sayin'."

item.name: Words of War
item.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, Words of War deals 2 damage to target creature or player instead.
item.flavorText: "Passions can't be shackled by laws or mastered with logic. The choice is freedom or death." —Volume IV, The Book of Fire

item.name: Animal Magnetism
item.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent chooses a creature card from among them. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

item.name: Barkhide Mauler
item.text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: Anywhere else they would be hunted for their skins, but in Wirewood, they are safe.

item.name: Biorhythm
item.text: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls.
item.flavorText: "I have seen life's purpose, and now it is my own." —Kamahl, druid acolyte

item.name: Birchlore Rangers
item.text: Tap two untapped Elves you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Morph {G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Bloodline Shaman
item.text: {T}: Choose a creature type. Reveal the top card of your library. If that card is a creature card of the chosen type, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
item.flavorText: Every creature of the forest has a name, and she knows them all.

item.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
item.text: Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield. Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Centaur Glade
item.text: {2}{G}{G}: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The Mirari called to the centaurs, and all who heard it were forever changed.

item.name: Chain of Acid
item.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Then that permanent's controller may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

item.name: Crown of Vigor
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice Crown of Vigor: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Life, be my shield."

item.name: Elven Riders
item.text: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."

item.name: Elvish Guidance
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool for each Elf on the battlefield (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: "Old home never forgotten, new home ours forever."

item.name: Elvish Pathcutter
item.text: {2}{G}: Target Elf creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
item.flavorText: In harsh times, the strongest currency is cooperation.

item.name: Elvish Pioneer
item.text: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: "Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime." —Kamahl, druid acolyte

item.name: Elvish Scrapper
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Scrapper: Destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: "The stories tell of a distant time when machines overran the forests, destroying everything that lived. That time will not come again."

item.name: Elvish Vanguard
item.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.
item.flavorText: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."

item.name: Elvish Warrior
item.flavorText: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

item.name: Enchantress's Presence
item.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "The wise learn from successes as well as mistakes."

item.name: Everglove Courier
item.text: You may choose not to untap Everglove Courier during your untap step. {2}{G}, {T}: Target Elf creature gets +2/+2 and has trample for as long as Everglove Courier remains tapped.

item.name: Explosive Vegetation
item.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

item.name: Gigapede
item.text: Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if Gigapede is in your graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Gigapede to your hand.

item.name: Heedless One
item.text: Trample Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Channel your vitality through me."

item.name: Hystrodon
item.text: Trample Whenever Hystrodon deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Invigorating Boon
item.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
item.flavorText: The Mirari's echoes rang in the scouts' minds long after they had returned from the Krosan Forest.

item.name: Kamahl, Fist of Krosa
item.text: {G}: Target land becomes a 1/1 creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "My mind has changed. My strength has not."

item.name: Kamahl's Summons
item.text: Each player may reveal any number of creature cards from his or her hand. Then each player puts a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield for each card he or she revealed this way.
item.flavorText: As Krosa unleashed the peace in Kamahl, he unleashed the fury in Krosa.

item.name: Krosan Colossus
item.text: Morph {6}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather.

item.name: Krosan Groundshaker
item.text: {G}: Target Beast creature gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: You know it's coming when you hear the distant thunder. You know where it's been when you see the path of broken trees.

item.name: Krosan Tusker
item.text: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Leery Fogbeast
item.text: Whenever Leery Fogbeast becomes blocked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: It emerges from the mists only to feed.

item.name: Mythic Proportions
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +8/+8 and has trample.
item.flavorText: The blood of Krosa turns rational beings into primal forces.

item.name: Naturalize
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "From here, let the world be reborn."

item.name: Overwhelming Instinct
item.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, draw a card.
item.flavorText: The biggest difference between a victory and a massacre is which side you're on.

item.name: Primal Boost
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Primal Boost, you may have target creature get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Ravenous Baloth
item.text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive." —Elvish refugee

item.name: Run Wild
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and "{G}: Regenerate this creature."
item.flavorText: Wirewood's beasts didn't seem to mind when the elves moved in. In fact, they hardly noticed them underfoot.

item.name: Serpentine Basilisk
item.text: Whenever Serpentine Basilisk deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Silklash Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The only thing that flies over the Krosan Forest is the wind.

item.name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
item.text: Trample {G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.
item.flavorText: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

item.name: Snarling Undorak
item.text: {2}{G}: Target Beast creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Most creatures in the Krosan Forest feared the Mirari's power. A few fed upon it.

item.name: Spitting Gourna
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Stag Beetle
item.text: Stag Beetle enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Its voice crackles with the hum of a thousand wings beating at once.

item.name: Steely Resolve
item.text: As Steely Resolve enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: No one in Wirewood understands what is happening. They just know it's unnatural—and coming from Krosa.

item.name: Symbiotic Beast
item.text: When Symbiotic Beast is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The insects found a meal in the carrion of the beast's prey. The beast found a spiffy new hairstyle.

item.name: Symbiotic Elf
item.text: When Symbiotic Elf is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The elves arriving in Wirewood had no homes, let alone weapons, but they knew that the forest would always provide.

item.name: Symbiotic Wurm
item.text: When Symbiotic Wurm is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

item.name: Taunting Elf
item.text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
item.flavorText: The safety of the village depends on the beast thinking with its stomach.

item.name: Tempting Wurm
item.text: When Tempting Wurm enters the battlefield, each opponent may put any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

item.name: Towering Baloth
item.text: Morph {6}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: The Mirari twisted all that lived in the Krosan Forest into gross mockeries of their former selves.

item.name: Treespring Lorian
item.text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: No matter your strength, the Krosan Forest is stronger. No matter your speed, the Wirewood Forest is faster.

item.name: Tribal Unity
item.text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

item.name: Venomspout Brackus
item.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Venomspout Brackus deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature with flying. Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Vitality Charm
item.text: Choose one — Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield; or target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn; or regenerate target Beast.

item.name: Voice of the Woods
item.text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

item.name: Wall of Mulch
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.

item.name: Weird Harvest
item.text: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
item.flavorText: Krosa's distorted groves bear strange fruit.

item.name: Wellwisher
item.text: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

item.name: Wirewood Elf
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

item.name: Wirewood Herald
item.text: When Wirewood Herald is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

item.name: Wirewood Pride
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."

item.name: Wirewood Savage
item.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "She is truly Wirewood's child now." —Elvish refugee

item.name: Words of Wilding
item.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield instead.
item.flavorText: "Instinct is undaunted by terror, unchained by logic. It is the path from which all other paths diverge." —Volume V, The Book of Life

item.name: Cryptic Gateway
item.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: You may put a creature card from your hand that shares a creature type with each creature tapped this way onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Its lock changes to fit each key.

item.name: Doom Cannon
item.text: As Doom Cannon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature of the chosen type: Doom Cannon deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Dream Chisel
item.text: Face-down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
item.flavorText: Itself a product of Ixidor's tortured psyche, the chisel brings his darkest dreams to life.

item.name: Riptide Replicator
item.text: As Riptide Replicator enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. Riptide Replicator enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {4}, {T}: Put an X/X creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield, where X is the number of charge counters on Riptide Replicator.

item.name: Slate of Ancestry
item.text: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
item.flavorText: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

item.name: Tribal Golem
item.text: Tribal Golem has trample as long as you control a Beast, haste as long as you control a Goblin, first strike as long as you control a Soldier, flying as long as you control a Wizard, and "{B}: Regenerate Tribal Golem" as long as you control a Zombie.

item.name: Barren Moor
item.text: Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Bloodstained Mire
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Contested Cliffs
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {R}{G}, {T}: Choose target Beast creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to the other.

item.name: Daru Encampment
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {W}, {T}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Flooded Strand
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Forgotten Cave
item.text: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Goblin Burrows
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Grand Coliseum
item.text: Grand Coliseum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Grand Coliseum deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Lonely Sandbar
item.text: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Polluted Delta
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Riptide Laboratory
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}{U}, {T}: Return target Wizard you control to its owner's hand.

item.name: Seaside Haven
item.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a Bird: Draw a card.

item.name: Secluded Steppe
item.text: Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Starlit Sanctum
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {W}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: Target player loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

item.name: Tranquil Thicket
item.text: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Unholy Grotto
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {B}, {T}: Put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

item.name: Windswept Heath
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Wirewood Lodge
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

item.name: Wooded Foothills
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
